Package index

All functions

audit_fairness()
Fairness audit: subgroup performance, calibration, and error balance
check_contamination()
Check criterion contamination (Mirror vs Non-Mirror)
cross_context_cv()
Cross-context validation (k-fold or leave-site-out)
decision_curve()
Decision-curve analysis (binary outcomes)
export_modelcard()
Export a model card (YAML) for transparency and reproducibility
la_eval()
Evaluate model predictions (classification or regression)
la_features()
Extract simple text features
la_fit()
Fit a model (classification or regression)
la_fit_mirror() la_fit_nonmirror()
Fit "Mirror" and "Non-Mirror" models (wrappers for readability)
la_predict()
Predict with a langAssessR model
pal_lang()
Color palette for langAssessR
plot_ablation()
Plot ablation
plot_attention_heatmap()
Plot attention heatmap
plot_auc_by_group()
Plot AUC by group
plot_calibration_by_group()
Plot calibration by group
plot_decision_curve()
Plot decision curve
plot_deid_counts()
Plot de-identification counts
plot_error_balance()
Plot error balance
plot_forest_compare()
Plot forest comparison
plot_site_performance()
Plot site-wise performance
plot_topic_lift()
Plot topic lift
scale_color_lang() scale_fill_lang()
Color scales for langAssessR
simulate_lang_data()
Simulate synthetic language-based assessment data
theme_lang()
Global theme for langAssessR figures
